title: Elden Ring: One of The Best Reviewed Games Ever?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.23.22
description:
Blessing and Andy talk about the INCREDIBLE reviews for Elden Ring, an update on Bioware, Call of Duty skipping next year, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:28 - Housekeeping
Our Elden Ring review is up right now as a Kinda Funny Gamescast. It’s me, it’s Andy, and it’s Tam with Tim hosting. Me, Andy, and Tam have all played varying levels of it and have a lot to say so go check that out on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report  -
00:03:20 - Elden Ring review round up
00:14:40 - Should I pick this up? - Best Friends Q:itzaMeBT
00:20:35 - Should the average gamer be more wary of spoilers than normal? - Best Friends Q:Mitch Krassin
00:30:35 - Guerrilla cannot keep escaping a BOTW-like masterpiece - Best Friends Q:Dblock
00:34:50 - BREAKING NEWS: UPDATE ON DRAGON AGE https://blog.bioware.com/2022/02/23/game-update-dragon-age-in-production/
00:40:00 - Ad
00:42:10 - Activision is delaying next year’s Call of Duty - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:53:29 - Nier: Automata Is Becoming an Anime - Ryan Leston @ IGN
00:58:40 - Iron Galaxy Studios is opening a new office - Jeffrey Rousseau @ GiBiz
01:00:30 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
01:02:00 - - Queso_Gatame
01:04:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim & Lucy
